campus_life.summary: This document outlines various aspects of campus life and available facilities, including student organizations, clubs, and societies. It also details essential services such as hostels, transportation, cafeteria, and healthcare, alongside recreational and cultural activities like sports, arts, and specific events such as the Smart India Hackathon 2022 and Toycathon Launchpad. Additionally, it mentions national programs like the National Cadet Corps (NCC) and National Service Scheme (NSS).

grievances_and_policies.summary: The provided text outlines various committees, policies, and online portals established to address grievances and prevent discrimination in an academic or organizational setting. These include measures against caste-based discrimination, mechanisms for student and employee grievance redressal, a committee for the prevention of sexual harassment, an anti-ragging policy, and a Covid-19 counselling cell.
